description: Riva is the Hotel Vista’s fine-dining restaurant, situated just behind Numana’s beach with fine panoramic views. The restaurant serves top-quality ingredients from the Adriatic and surrounding countryside in creative dishes full of flavour which are showcased on tasting menus and an à la carte.
